name: Created by a Robot Takeover
description:
This is my contribution to the LibGDX Jam 22. It's a post-apocalyptic racing game or something or another.

What year is it? No one knows anymore. All we know is that the robots hate us - but they haven't got the guts to finish the job. But today is the race.

Credits: 

The cars are from this pack - https://grafxkid.itch.io/mini-pixel-pack-2
